name: Harvey Miller
biography: Harvey Skolnik (June 15, 1935 â€“ January 8, 1999) was an American actor, director, producer and screenwriter. He was nominated for an Academy Award in the category Best Original Screenplay for the film Private Benjamin. He also was nominated for two Primetime Emmy Awards in the category Outstanding Comedy Series for his work on The Odd Couple and Love, American Style.In January 1999, Miller died of heart failure at his home in Los Angeles, California, at the age of 63.
